VRPose.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The VRPose interface of the WebVR API represents the state of a VR sensor at a given timestamp (which includes orientation, position, velocity, and acceleration information).

blockquote.para: Note: This interface was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: This interface is accessible through the and methods. is deprecated.
